name: Ultimate Paintbrawl 3
summary: In-your-face paintball tournament action. Charge through the brush, watching over your shoulder. Feel the air pumping through your lungs and the adrenaline rushing through your veins. You are the Captain of your paintball team. Handpick your team members, outfit them with authentic safety gear and paintball markers, and execute strategies that will lead you to victory. Choose from 10 different large-scale maps. Get in your gear. Get the enemy in your sights. Get in the action.
